did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: The Education Collection includes bibliographies, reports, papers, articles, biographies, textbooks, teaching materials, pamphlets, newspaper clippings, conference programs, proposals, scholarly papers, course syllabi and correspondence pertaining to women's education.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Education Collection includes bibliographies, reports, papers, articles, biographies, textbooks, teaching materials, pamphlets, newspaper clippings, conference programs, proposals, scholarly papers, course syllabi and correspondence pertaining to women's education. There are a few original manuscript items. Areas of focus are sexism in education, continuing education, Women's Studies, higher education, physical education, the American Labor Education Service, women's education in other countries, and in individual states. There is a substantial collection of catalogues and other printed material related to individual colleges, universities, and secondary schools from the nineteenth century. Under the topic of Women's Studies, there is information on associations, programs, research centers and conferences. The dates of the collection range from 1828 to 1993 with the bulk of the material being from the 1970s.

accessrestrict.p: The papers are open to research according to the regulations of the Sophia Smith Collection.

userestrict.p: Materials in this subject collection were either purchased or given to the Sophia Smith Collection by various donors. Periodic additions are expected. The collection is open to research according to the regulations of the Sophia Smith Collection. Permission to publish quotations for publication beyond "fair use" must be obtained from the Sophia Smith Collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Education Collection, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, Northampton, MA.

accruals.head: Additions to the Collection
accruals.p: Periodic additions to collection are expected and may not be reflected in this record.

controlaccess.head: Search Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms represent persons, organizations, and topics documented in this collection. To find additional materials use these headings to search this web site, the Five College Library Catalog, or other library catalogs and databases.
